Comment: Seeing as [Chair"person" Greene resorted to defaming a subpoenaed witness by using a doctored photograph in her hearing](https://youtu.be/GNlZi3nJPUI?si=nLqgFysumkD4yU04&t=490), I think "fixation" is something of an understatement. ***Monomania***, referring to the mental illness, is much apropos of her disgusting behavior in the hearing. Greene displays a photo doctored to make the witness appear to be "giving the finger" to the committee while seemingly referring to his testimony as "Game Day". I lost it and busted up laughing. Here I am worried and pouring out my soul, just to live life authenticity, yet cis white Indiana orgies aren‚Äôt on the ballet.   I don‚Äôt care as long as they are safe, not gross about it and leave my family alone. I don‚Äôt want my children learning about the behaviors of sexually repressed Christians until we have the birds/bees talk. But yeah more furries than trans and more sexually repressed religious folks than trans that the only outlet is honk if your horny bumper stickers. I think they should leave but I‚Äôm just one trans person feeling the hypocrisy.   Also I had way more questions than he did of me. Like was there a buffet? Themes? There has to be a Gatsby night or at least generic spy night. And if you are wondering if there was a furry night, there absolutely was.   The kingdom of heaven is within. The feeling of self righteousness doesn‚Äôt fulfill the ego, only balance and harmony within. The irony of attacking someone because they are seeking balance is insane but I understand because I am now balanced. I see their struggle to blame others because there‚Äôs comfort in self righteousness but it‚Äôs not a peaceful state. It‚Äôs one of projecting so your flaws or hotel orgy parties, insider trading aren‚Äôt discovered. They chase greed and power rather than balance.   Sorry had to vent.
